entry.title: Deliberate Practice
entry.content:
Individuals engage Deliberate Practice only when they work in solitude.

  • Studies suggests that elite performers spends more time practicing alone than those in their peers.
  • Open office nullifies the efficacies of #collaboration
  • The minds who created revolutionary inventions such as Linux, Wikipedia, or Personal Computer spends more of their time not with their colleagues collaborating, but their time working alone.
